title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian-inspired dish with tender beef strips and a creamy sauce.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, peanuts, and a tangy sauce.

title: Moussaka
summary: A Greek casserole layered with eggplant, ground meat, and béchamel sauce.

title: Sushi Rolls
summary: Japanese rice rolls filled with seafood, vegetables, and sometimes tropical fruit.

title: Tacos al Pastor
summary: Mexican street food with marinated pork, pineapple, and cilantro wrapped in a soft tortilla.

title: Vegetarian Lasagna
summary: A hearty, meat-free lasagna layered with spinach, mushrooms, and ricotta cheese.

title: Ceviche
summary: A South American seafood dish made from fresh fish marinated in citrus juices.

title: Butter Chicken
summary: A rich and creamy curry made with tender chicken pieces and aromatic spices.

title: Fettuccine Alfredo
summary: Italian pasta tossed with a creamy parmesan cheese sauce.

title: Ratatouille
summary: A French Provençal stewed vegetable dish made with eggplant, zucchini, and tomatoes.

title: Chicken Parmesan
summary: Breaded chicken cutlets covered with marinara sauce and melted cheese.

title: Goulash
summary: A Hungarian stew of meat and vegetables, seasoned with paprika and other spices.

title: Peking Duck
summary: A famous Chinese dish featuring roasted duck with crispy skin and tender meat.

title: Shakshuka
summary: A North African dish of poached eggs in a spiced tomato and pepper sauce.

title: Lamb Rogan Josh
summary: An aromatic lamb curry from Kashmir, slow-cooked with a blend of spices.

title: Falafel
summary: Middle Eastern deep-fried balls made from ground chickpeas and herbs.

title: Pho
summary: Vietnamese noodle soup with broth, rice noodles, herbs, and beef or chicken.

title: Paella
summary: A Spanish rice dish with seafood, saffron, and vegetables.

title: Baklava
summary: A sweet Turkish pastry made of layers of filo filled with chopped nuts and honey.

title: Gazpacho
summary: A cold Spanish tomato-based soup, served with diced vegetables.

title: Chicken Shawarma
summary: Marinated chicken roasted on a spit, served with pita bread and garlic sauce.

title: Clam Chowder
summary: A rich, creamy soup made with clams, potatoes, and onions.

title: Jambalaya
summary: A spicy Louisiana dish made with rice, sausage, shrimp, and vegetables.

title: Coq au Vin
summary: A classic French dish of chicken braised with wine, mushrooms, and bacon.

title: Ramen
summary: A Japanese noodle soup with meat, eggs, and various toppings in a flavorful broth.

title: Biryani
summary: An Indian dish made with spiced rice and meat, often chicken or lamb.

title: Miso Soup
summary: A traditional Japanese soup with tofu, seaweed, and miso paste.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
summary: Bell peppers filled with rice, vegetables, and ground meat, baked until tender.
